document_data.name: Ovros Thilymm
document_data.mainbody: '''Ovros Thilymm''' was a man of [[Mordulkin]] in [[Chessenta]] and Head Librarian of the [[Jedea Academy]] in the early 1370s [[DR]].
document_data.History: In the winter of the [[1374 DR|Year of Lightning Storms, 1374 DR]], Ovros led [[Ythnel Duumin]], [[Kestus Aentius]], [[Muctos Dapritus]], and [[Kohtakah]] to a secret meeting with a contactâ€”in truth, King [[Hercubes Jedea]].
document_data.Description: He was an old man who wore a conical hat and a medallion bearing a cut [[sapphire]]. He used a magic glowing quill to write with at night.
